source:
%%sql
SELECT 
 sap_hr.pins_staff_number
,sap_hr.given_names
,sap_hr.family_name
,sap_hr.active_status
,sap_hr.FTE
,sap_hr.is_sgl
,sap_hr.resource_code
,sap_hr.emp_type
,inspector_address.PINS_Join_staff_number
,inspector_address.inspector_postcode
,inspector_address.date_in
,inspector_address.date_out
,inspector_address.Charting_Officer_for_Inspector
,inspector_address.Inspector_Address
,inspector_address.Telephone_no
,inspector_address.Work_Mobile
,inspector_raw.id
,inspector_raw.Family_Name
,inspector_raw.Grade
,sap_pins_email.Staff_Number
,sap_pins_email.Email_Address
,vw_sap_hr_email.PINS_Join_staff_number
,vw_sap_hr_email.email_address
,vw_sap_hr_email_weekly.PINS_Join_staff_number
,vw_sap_hr_email_weekly.email_address
 FROM 
 odw_workspace_db.sap_hr_layer1_harmonised sap_hr
 LEFT OUTER JOIN
 odw_workspace_db.inspector_address_layer1_harmonised inspector_address
 ON sap_hr.pins_staff_number = inspector_address.PINS_Join_staff_number
 LEFT OUTER JOIN
 odw_workspace_db.inspector_raw_layer1_harmonised inspector_raw
 ON 1=1
 LEFT OUTER JOIN
 odw_workspace_db.sap_pins_email_layer1_harmonised sap_pins_email
 ON 1=1
 LEFT OUTER JOIN
 odw_workspace_db.vw_sap_hr_email_layer1_harmonised vw_sap_hr_email
 ON 1=1
 LEFT OUTER JOIN
 odw_workspace_db.dbo.vw_sap_hr_email_weekly_layer1_harmonised vw_sap_hr_email_weekly
